title: Laapataa Ladies
writer: Biplab Goswami, Divyanidhi Sharma, Sneha Desai
short_cast: Nitanshi Goel, Pratibha Ranta, Sparsh Shrivastava, Ravi Kishan, Chhaya Kadam, Geeta Agrawal Sharma, Pankaj Sharma, Rachna Gupta, Bhaskar Jha, Daood Hussain, Satendra Soni, Durgesh Kumar
cast: Nitanshi Goel, Pratibha Ranta, Sparsh Shrivastava, Ravi Kishan, Chhaya Kadam, Geeta Agrawal Sharma, Pankaj Sharma, Rachna Gupta, Bhaskar Jha, Daood Hussain, Satendra Soni, Durgesh Kumar

desc: Mistakenly swapped en route to their new husbands' homes, two brides navigate their unexpected surroundings, making delightful self-discovery journeys.
